title: Why do political cartoons have titles? - Quora

response.answer_text: Before the 1950’s it was common for political cartoons to have titles but today the practice is very rare. Modern political cartoons usually rely on dialog or the visuals alone to communicate the idea. Below are three examples from my work.  An example of a image based cartoon which also has a title.  An image only cartoon without a title.  An example of a a dialog based cartoon.
